channel.title: Erased Players
channel.description: I have made it so players can only login with Silabs client or my client and now when someone attempts to login using a diff client with a existing char it erases all the char data how can i make it so it dosent do this or atleast rewrites it? :confused:

item.title: Erased Players
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

See, if you just leech off of a guide and don’t read it, then you get problems you can’t fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Erased Players
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“demon fox337, post:11, topic:390753”]here ya go…

if (junk != 6273010 && junk != 1125) {
disconnected = true;
destruct();
}[/quote]

Try removing the destruct… if no luck just reply :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Erased Players
item.dc:creator: @demon_fox337 demon fox337
item.description:
@demon_fox337 wrote:

here ya go…

if (junk != 6273010 && junk != 1125) {
disconnected = true;
destruct();
}

item.title: Erased Players
item.dc:creator: @demon_fox337 demon fox337
item.description:
@demon_fox337 wrote:

  1. i didn’t set it to erase any players as far as i can tell its a glitch and it doesn’t delete the account it goes into the text file and erases everything and when they try to login on their client it says something like can not connect to server try a different world and will continue to do so until i delete the blank text file or they make a new account

  2. Also i don’t know how to make other clients display messages as far as i knew everything before login is client sided and i cant change it unless i do and re-upload but there are several silabs out there not just my link so even if i did change it the vast majority of people would probably download someone elses silab and the whole process would be pretty much pointless.

Responses below:

  1. response to xxx its not a good thing because people will not be abel to play again unless they use a diff account which would be frustrating
    and make me lose players in the long run and mabe he tried to use mopars client as alot of people do and they get punished for no reason?

  2. in response to ranger it already kicks them and i never coded it to erase everything in their file

  3. and finally response to love i do not know how to make the server display a message to the client unless someone is logged in and thats not good seeing as how some people will never log in because they are using a client i didn’t permit

thank you all for input but i am still looking for a answer

Read full topic

item.title: Erased Players
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Or just find where you added the code to erase the players and set it to kick them?

Read full topic

item.title: Erased Players
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

farme:

Not really?if someone doesn’t know about it and he loggins for anyreason from another client, well all his work gone for nothing

I highly disagree, let’s say this was happening to your server. Then some guy, richest ingame. With phats, santas and all that, wants to make himself look like admin, its not hard to do with a cheat client. Even with a cheat client he can mess your server, spawn items, appear admin and obtain goods, noclip/go invisible. It’s really just better to have his account wiped then having him cheat.

Read full topic

item.title: Erased Players
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Thats actually a good thing. It makes it so that no more spammers or cheat clients wreck your server. I’d recommend just leaving it. And ask yourself this, why would they login using a different client?

^ this

you can warn somebody by adding that as a note while it’s loading or something…

Read full topic

item.title: Erased Players
item.dc:creator: @farme farme
item.description:

item.title: Erased Players
item.dc:creator: @Hells-History Hells-History
item.description:
@Hells-History wrote:

demon fox337:

I have made it so players can only login with Silabs client or my client and now when someone attempts to login using a diff client with a existing char it erases all the char data how can i make it so it dosent do this or atleast rewrites it?

I agree with xxxxtilllyxxx, but, change the background pic, and add some text saying: "logging in with any other client, will delete your existing account!

Read full topic

item.title: Erased Players

item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Thats actually a good thing. It makes it so that no more spammers or cheat clients wreck your server. I’d recommend just leaving it. And ask yourself this, why would they login using a different client?
